column1: Little Goat Diner////The food was delicious and priced moderately.  The service was friendly and helpful. We waited for 20 mins. for our seats - on a weekend
column2: which isn't bad.  We ordered Hot crab dip
column4: Mushroom Ragout and fish tostadas. It's a casual place to have dinner with friends.  The atmosphere and decor is okay..
column6: but not your greasy diner either.
